itemDisplayName: Deploy an AHDS MedTech service including an Azure IoT Hub
description: MedTech service is an optional service of the Azure Health Data Services designed to ingest data from multiple and disparate Internet of Medical Things (IoMT) devices. MedTech service normalizes, groups, transforms, and persists device data in the Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIRÂ®) service.
summary: This template deploys a MedTech service with the necessary Azure Health Data Services resources and an Azure IoT Hub with message routing to the device event hub.
